description:
As a Litigation Paralegal, you'll work alongside in-house Counsel, outside Counsel, and Discovery team members to research legal claims made against Google in a variety of matters. The types of matters may include small claims, breach of contract, trademark infringement, copyright infringement, personal injury, class actions, privacy-related matters, and regulatory inquiries and investigations. You will also contribute to projects related to tool development and process improvements to increase operational efficiencies.

20th century laws don't always solve 21st century problems, and Google Legal crafts innovative approaches for handling some of the toughest legal challenges of the information age. Whether you're a patent attorney, an intellectual property expert or an engineer headed to law school, Google Legal lets you take on unanswered legal quandaries and create new precedents. Our innovative services raise challenging questions that demand creative and practical answers. We provide those answers by working at the crossroads of the law and new technology, helping Google build innovative and important products for users around the world.

qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.
  • 2 years of experience as a Paralegal or Legal Assistant at a law firm or in-house legal department.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience working with complex electronic discovery, internet technology, regulatory investigations and general litigation.
  • Effective analytical skills with the ability to review and organize numerous documents in complex legal matters.
  • Demonstrated interpersonal and communication skills and a commitment to professionalism and collegiality.
responsibilities:
• Work alongside Litigation and Regulatory teams to conduct fact-finding investigations to gather information and data responses to discovery and regulatory agency requests.
  • Coordinate with external legal counsel on specific assignments, review preliminary advice and provide internal recommendations.
  • Assist counsel in case management including managing data preservation, collection, review and production procedures.
  • Collaborate with the Litigation and Regulatory teams, as well as other groups at Google, to ensure our internal systems work well with our discovery procedures.
  • Work collaboratively with Discovery team members to supervise document retrieval and document production, coordinating with internal and external legal counsel.
title: Litigation Paralegal
